#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
# define max 1000001
long long int a[max];
long long int b[max];
long long int c[max];
int main()
{
    long long int i,j,k=1,sum,t,n;
    a[0]=0;c[0]=0;
    for(i=1;i<max;i++)
    a[i]=i;
    for(i=4;i<max;i+=2)
    a[i]=0;
    for(i=3;i<sqrt(max);i+=2)
    {
                         if(!a[i])
                         continue;
                         for(j=i*i;j<max;j+=(i<<1))
                         a[j]=0;
    }
    b[0]=0;j=1;
    for(i=2;i<max;i++)
    {
                      if(a[i])
                      b[j++]=a[i];
    }
    for(i=1;i<max;i++)
    if(2*b[i]==b[i-1]+b[i+1])
    c[k++]=b[i];
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%lld",&n);
              printf("%lld\n",c[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
